heading: HR02006
0: A RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO (CHURCH OF CHRIST) FOR MARKING ITS 104TH ANNIVERSARY IN THE PHILIPPINES (FAR EAST) WHERE IT FIRST EMERGED AND 50TH ANNIVERSARY  IN THE FAR WEST AS IT CONTINUES TO CARRY OUT ITS SUCCESSFUL INTENSIVE WORLDWIDE PROPAGATION OF GOD'S WORDS AND INTERNATIONAL AID TO HUMANITY
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02006
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO (CHURCH OF CHRIST) FOR MARKING ITS 104TH ANNIVERSARY IN THE PHILIPPINES (FAR EAST) WHERE IT FIRST EMERGED AND 50TH ANNIVERSARY IN THE FAR WEST AS IT CONTINUES TO CARRY OUT ITS SUCCESSFUL INTENSIVE WORLDWIDE PROPAGATION OF GOD'S WORDS AND INTERNATIONAL AID TO HUMANITY
